question_text:
Question 59 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Aptitude
What will be the mirror image of the following word TRIANGLE if mirrored along x-axis.
[1 Mark]
y
TRIANGLE
The mirror image of the above text about the X-axis is
x
(A) 
 
(B) 
 
(C) 
 
(D)
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
If mirror is placed on 
x
-axis, then the correct image is
